name: Venom Vendetta
storyline:
Breaking news! Hell is up to no good again! After burning our crops, they are now poisoning our city's water supply!
It all happened yesterday! A no-good Spiderdemon made herself at home at Doom city's water supply facility!
Now she and her cohorts are spewing their poison everywhere, contaminating our precious water!
﻿
Hold on... We just received a report! An exterminator is now on its way to clean up this mess!
Stay tuned for more details coming soon!﻿
summary: Venom Vendetta is a short single tech-base-themed mbf21 map for Doom2. The main focus was to make a map with a small monster count that could be quickly completed.
